## BeyoncÃ©

```{r avg-danceability}
#| label: tbl-beyonce
#| tbl-cap: Average Danceability of Beyonce Albums
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false


beyonce <- as_tibble(beyonce)
 
beyonce |>
  filter(album_release_date_precision == "day") |> 
  mutate(album_release_date = ymd(album_release_date)) |>
  summarize(ave_danceability = mean(danceability), .by = "album_name") |> 
  knitr::kable(
    col.names = c("Album", "Average danceability"),
    digits = 3,
    booktabs = TRUE,
    linesep = ""
  )


```

```{r timeline}
#| label: fig-beyonce
#| fig-cap: Danceability of Beyonce Songs  over time
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

beyonce <- as_tibble(beyonce)

beyonce |>
  filter(album_release_date_precision == "day") |> 
  mutate(album_release_date = ymd(album_release_date)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(
    x = album_release_date,
    y = danceability,
    group = album_release_date
  )) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Album release date",
       y = "Danceability")
  
```

## Fifth Harmony and Camila Cabello

```{r valence-timeline}
#| label: fig-fifth
#| fig-cap: Valence of Fifth Harmony albums over time
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false


fifth_harmony <- as_tibble(fifth_harmony)

fifth_harmony |>
  filter(album_name %in% c("Reflection", "7/27 (Deluxe)", "Fifth Harmony")) |> 
  mutate(album_release_date = ymd(album_release_date)) |>
  filter(album_release_date != "2017-10-29") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = album_name, y = valence)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Album",
       y = "Valence")

```

We see that the valence (read: happiness) of Fifth Harmony generally went up after Camila Cabello left the group.
